mdRecord.dcterms:title: Beautiful wood / Mendelssohn ; arr. by Burgmüller
Mendelssohn-Bartholdy, Felix, 1809-1847. Lieder, men's voices. op. 50. arr. Jäger Abschied; arr
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Mendelssohn-Bartholdy, Felix, 1809-1847
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Publication date derived from publisher's address. Cf. Handbook of early American sheet music / Dichter and Shapiro.
Advertisement on p. [4]: "Most popular piano pieces published," with excerpts from Woodland musings / F.W. Meacham; Sweet memory / J.W. Turner; Fairy echoes / Adolph Immer ; Valeska / F.W. Meacham.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Classical bouquet / easily arranged without octaves for the pianoforte by Burgmuller ; 6
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Piano music, Arranged
